resources.string: This will exit your application. Are you sure?

These are the Terms of Service and Privacy Policy of This application. This application which provides you with the Application Locker. This privacy policy provides an overview about how we process personal data about users of our mobile applications we provide to you.We will not share your personal information anyone excepts as described in the privacy policy

This application respects your right to privacy. Your ability to make informed choices about the use of your information is important to us. We collect several different types of information for various purposes to provide and improve our Services for you.
Permissions in this Application are the Following
• Package Stats Usage \n• Draw Over Other Apps \n• Accessibility Service

We may change this privacy policy from time to time by posting the most current privacy policy and its effective date. In case we change this privacy policy substantially, we may bring such changes to your attention by explicit notice in this page.
We do not include or offer third-party products or services on our website.

Our Service does not address anyone under the age of 18 ("Children"). We do not knowingly collect personally identifiable information from anyone under the age of 18. If you are a parent or guardian and you are aware that your Children has provided us with Personal Data, please contact us. If we become aware that we have collected Personal Data from children without verification of parental consent, we take steps to remove that information from our servers.
If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact Us.
Use your fingerprint to unlock faster
Lock newly installed apps with one tap
\"Usage Access Permission\" is required to lock your apps. Don\'t worry this information is only stored in your phone.
Error: Usage Access Permission not Granted. App won\'t work properly
Draw Over Apps permission is required to lock your app.
Watch a tutorial to get to know how this app works.
Change Secret Image or Secret Answer
Select a secret Image from the list below. It will help us identify you, in case you forget your Pin/Pattern.
Enter your secret text for image here
You have not set any secret Image yet.
Please find \"&appname;\" in the list, and grant required permission
Please find \"&appname;\" in Downloaded Services/Downloaded Apps section and allow to use Accessibility service
Please allow \"&appname;\" to display over other apps.
Share this incredible app with your friends and family and secure your phone .
Reduce App Locker\'s battery consumption by 50%.
Accessibility Service Permission is required to lock your apps without showing notifications
This will clear all the app data and settings.
Provide necessary permissions to utilize our app service
